description: Number of n X n binary matrices with no zero rows or columns and with n+1 ones.
formula: Number of m X n binary matrices with no zero rows or columns and with k=0..m*n ones is Sum_{i=0..n} (-1)^i*binomial(n, i)*a(m, n-i, k) where a(m, n, k)=Sum_{i=0..m} (-1)^i*binomial(m, i)*binomial((m-i)*n, k).a(n) = n*(n-1)*(n+2)*n!/4. - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Mar 25 2006
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jun 01 2000
